bioAsHtml: Stefano is a Staff Software Engineer working for HomeAway in London, UK. He has been developing software within the cozy boundaries of the JVM for a few years, and he has recently become passionate about the Scala ecosystem - especially all things Akka. He has contributed to Akka, Akka HTTP and Alpakka codebases.

acceptedTalks.title: Cracking marketing automation with Reactive Streams
